name: Trader Vic Mai Tai Cocktail
author: Allrecipes
summary: California restaurateur Trader Vic is credited with invention of the mai tai. He served the rum and juice cocktail to friends visiting from Tahiti, who exclaimed, 'Maita'i roa ae!' The term translates to 'very good' and the name mai tai stuck.
ingredients: 2 fluid ounces 17-year old J. Wray Nephew Jamaican Rum
½ fluid ounce French Garnier Orgeat
½ fluid ounce orange Curacao liqueur
¼ fluid ounce rock candy syrup
directions: Fill a rocks glass with 1 cup crushed ice
Combine rum, orgeat, orange Curacao, rock candy syrup, and lime juice in a cocktail shaker
Add 1 cup ice, cover and shake until chilled
Strain into the chilled rocks glass
Garnish with half of the lime shell inside the drink and float a sprig of fresh mint on the edge of the glass
